description: Installation of new doors at rear and bin store within plant room, located below external stairs;Installation of side extension on northern boundary of upper ground level; installation of window to front of property extension; new double glazed windows to rear sun room; new rear terrace along southern boundary. First floor single storey extension towards front with lead roof; install frameless rooflight to stairs along northern boundary. Addition of rooflight to study at rear second floor. Replace rooflight above stairs on northern boundary at third floor; install roof tiles at rear, with new rooflight and window on rear wall into stairwell; relocate rooflight into stairwell. Install air conditioning unit with acoustic enclosure at roof level; relocate and expand solar panels; lead dormer at roof level. ***WITHDRAWN***
